name: Hijinx: A Christmas Caper
description:
Hijinx is back! And this time, it's festive.

Run, jump and wallslide your way through 24 mini-levels in A Christmas Caper! When the jolly guy from Lapland is left without a working sled, it's up to Jinx and Carl to save the day, in what totally isn't a completely arbitrary excuse for a bunch of Christmasy platforming challenges.

Move with arrow keys
Jump with X
Interact with C
Restart level with R
Pause with Escape

(In-game controls are rebindable.)

Design & code by John Gabriel
Art by Jerico Landry
Sound design by Vidar Leimar
Playtested by Will Bradley and Karlo Koščal
Cover art by Fadil Rahadiansyah
Music by One Man Symphony
Made with Godot Engine 3.2.3

The source code for Hijinx: A Christmas Caper can be found here.
